Articles.Content:
I have MechJeb and KAC recently installed, but was running without add-ons for quite a while on this build. A couple days ago I went to check a space station in Kerbin orbit, and found it had no orbital track, and when I switched to it, it was motionless (surface speed was about 1mm/s according to MechJeb. I could not operate anything on the station or undock any ships. I looked back at the orbital map, and its status said "at VAB Tanks"

I just upgraded to Windows 10 a few day ago, not sure if that matters.
